episode52.name: 49   Hogs lose a heartbreaker against A&M
episode52.description: The crew discusses the heartbreaker and talks about the eerie similarities to the A&M game last season. We also preview the upcoming BERT off in Knoxville with Tennessee.
episode52.keywords: Tenneesee, Arkansas, Football, BERT, Bielema, Hogs, WPS, The Hog Cast
